verses.text: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stir|strong="H5782"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Babylon \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Leb-kamai \f + \fr 51:1 \ft Leb-kamai is a code name for Chaldea, that is, Babylonia.\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyer|strong="H7843"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Babylon \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w winnow|strong="H2219"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty|strong="H1238"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* land; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w archer|strong="H1869"\w* \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w or|strong="H2550"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* armor. \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* young \w men|strong="H3605"\w*; \w devote|strong="H2763"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*!\f + \fr 51:3 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.\f*

\w And|strong="H5307"\w* \w they|strong="H2351"\w* \w will|strong="H2491"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H2351"\w* land \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H2351"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*,\f + \fr 51:4 \ft That is, the Babylonians; also in verse 54\f* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w pierced|strong="H1856"\w* \w through|strong="H1856"\w* \w in|strong="H5307"\w* her \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* abandoned \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* land \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”

\w Flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* Babylon! \w Escape|strong="H4422"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*! \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H1826"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w*; \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w what|strong="H7999"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w deserves|strong="H1576"\w*.

Babylon \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w making|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3068"\w* \w mad|strong="H1984"\w*.

\w Suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* Babylon \w has|strong="H3947"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* been \w shattered|strong="H7665"\w*. \w Wail|strong="H3213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*; \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w pain|strong="H4341"\w*; perhaps \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w can|strong="H3947"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

“\w We|strong="H3588"\w* tried \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* Babylon, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H4941"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*. \w Abandon|strong="H5800"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w*! \w Let|strong="H5800"\w* each \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* own \w land|strong="H8064"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w extends|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sky|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w reaches|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*.”

“\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w vindication|strong="H6666"\w*; \w come|strong="H3318"\w*, let \w us|strong="H6666"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w what|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* accomplished.”

\w Sharpen|strong="H1305"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*! \w Fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w quivers|strong="H7982"\w*!\f + \fr 51:11 \ft LXX and some translations of the Hebrew; literally Fill the hand with the shields! or Take up the shields!\f* \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w aroused|strong="H5782"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* plan \w is|strong="H3068"\w* aimed \w at|strong="H5921"\w* Babylon \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*— \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

\w Raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w banner|strong="H5251"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Babylon; \w post|strong="H4929"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w*; \w station|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w*; \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ambush. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w devised|strong="H2161"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Babylon.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, rich \w in|strong="H5921"\w* treasures, \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w has|strong="H7093"\w* come; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thread \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* life \w is|strong="H7093"\w* cut.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Himself|strong="H5315"\w*: “\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w men|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w locusts|strong="H3218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w shout|strong="H1959"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* triumph \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” Praise to the God of Jacob (Isaiah 25:1–12)

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w His|strong="H5186"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*; \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w His|strong="H5186"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w His|strong="H5186"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w thunders|strong="H6963"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w roar|strong="H1995"\w*; \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w causes|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5387"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w rise|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* generates \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w brings|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* storehouses.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w senseless|strong="H1197"\w* \w and|strong="H7307"\w* devoid \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*; \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w goldsmith|strong="H6884"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w put|strong="H1197"\w* \w to|strong="H7307"\w* shame \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H6459"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w molten|strong="H5262"\w* \w images|strong="H5262"\w* \w are|strong="H5262"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fraud, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w worthless|strong="H1892"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w be|strong="H6256"\w* mocked. \w In|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H6256"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w punishment|strong="H6486"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H1892"\w* perish.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Maker|strong="H3335"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*— \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. Babylon’s Punishment

“\w You|strong="H7843"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w My|strong="H7843"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* club, \w My|strong="H7843"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* \w for|strong="H3627"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*. \w With|strong="H3627"\w* \w you|strong="H7843"\w* \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w you|strong="H7843"\w* \w I|strong="H5310"\w* bring \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w to|strong="H1471"\w* \w ruin|strong="H7843"\w*.

\w With|strong="H5483"\w* you \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H7392"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w rider|strong="H7392"\w*; \w with|strong="H5483"\w* you \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H7392"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* driver.

\w With|strong="H2205"\w* \w you|strong="H2205"\w* \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* woman; \w with|strong="H2205"\w* \w you|strong="H2205"\w* \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w youth|strong="H5288"\w*; \w with|strong="H2205"\w* \w you|strong="H2205"\w* \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w maiden|strong="H1330"\w*.

\w With|strong="H7462"\w* you \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w and|strong="H6346"\w* \w his|strong="H7462"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*; \w with|strong="H7462"\w* you \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* farmer \w and|strong="H6346"\w* \w his|strong="H7462"\w* \w oxen|strong="H6776"\w*; \w with|strong="H7462"\w* you \w I|strong="H5310"\w* \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w and|strong="H6346"\w* \w officials|strong="H5461"\w*.

\w Before|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H6213"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* Babylon \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dwellers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w* \f + \fr 51:24 \ft That is, Babylonia; also in verse 35\f* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*,” declares the LORD.
